actionable_tasks.title: Complete MongoDB TTL Indexes
actionable_tasks.description: Finish implementing MongoDB TTL indexes at 50% progress for automatic document expiration, targeting logs or temporary data collections to optimize storage and performance.
implementation_steps: Identify collections needing TTL (e.g., session logs, temp recommendations)
Add TTL index on expiry field: db.collection.createIndex({ "expiresAt": 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 0 })
Test index creation and document auto-deletion
Update schema models to include expiresAt field where missing

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Performance Monitoring to p50/p95 Tracking
actionable_tasks.description: Advance performance monitoring from 40% by adding p50 and p95 latency metrics collection and dashboard display, using existing basic metrics setup.
implementation_steps: Integrate percentile calculation library or custom function for p50/p95 from latency samples
Update metric collection middleware to aggregate percentiles
Add p50/p95 visualizations to analytics dashboard
Test with load simulation to verify accuracy against Q1 target <200ms p95

actionable_tasks.title: Implement Basic Testing Expansion
actionable_tasks.description: Increase test coverage from ~45% to >50% by adding Jest tests for MCP endpoints and provider health checks, focusing on high-impact untested areas.
implementation_steps: Write unit tests for MCP server endpoints (e.g., health checks, failover)
Add integration tests for multi-provider LLM switching
Run coverage report and target gaps in src/api/routes/* and src/chat/*
Update CI to fail on coverage <50%

actionable_tasks.title: Add Docker Optimization for Multi-Stage Builds
actionable_tasks.description: Optimize Docker setup with multi-stage builds and caching for faster dev/prod images, using existing containerization base.
implementation_steps: Refactor Dockerfile into build and runtime stages (e.g., npm ci --only=production)
Add .dockerignore and layer caching for node_modules
Test build time reduction and image size
Update compose for local dev with volume mounts

actionable_tasks.title: Implement AI Transparency Metadata Tagging
actionable_tasks.description: Start AI Transparency by adding metadata tagging for AI-generated recommendations in MongoDB and API responses.
implementation_steps: Add aiGenerated: true/false and modelUsed: string fields to recommendation schema
Tag responses from LLM providers automatically
Verify tagging in chat interface responses
Document for upcoming UI badges
